slides.title: Welcome to ACCA SBR
slides.content:
# Strategic Business Reporting (SBR)

SBR focuses on **advanced financial reporting** under IFRS.

## What You Will Learn

- **Conceptual Framework** - Advanced application
- **Complex IFRS** - Standards in depth
- **Group Reporting** - Consolidation
- **Current Issues** - Emerging topics

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Framework | 15% |
| Standards | 40% |
| Groups | 25% |
| Ethics | 10% |
| Current issues | 10% |

slides.title: Conceptual Framework
slides.content:
# IASB Framework

## Objective of Financial Reporting

Provide useful financial information to users.

## Qualitative Characteristics

| Fundamental | Enhancing |
|-------------|----------|
| Relevance | Comparability |
| Faithful representation | Verifiability |
| | Timeliness |
| | Understandability |

## Elements

| Element | Definition |
|---------|------------|
| Asset | Resource controlled |
| Liability | Present obligation |
| Equity | Residual interest |
| Income | Increases in assets |
| Expenses | Decreases in assets |

## Measurement Bases

- Historical cost
- Fair value
- Value in use
- Current cost

slides.title: IFRS 9 - Financial Instruments
slides.content:
# Financial Instruments

## Classification

| Category | Measurement |
|----------|-------------|
| Amortized cost | Effective interest |
| FVOCI | FV through OCI |
| FVPL | FV through P&L |

## Business Model Test

| Model | Intent |
|-------|--------|
| Hold to collect | AC |
| Collect and sell | FVOCI |
| Other | FVPL |

## Expected Credit Losses

| Stage | Recognition |
|-------|-------------|
| 1 | 12-month ECL |
| 2 | Lifetime ECL |
| 3 | Lifetime + interest on net |

## Hedge Accounting

- Fair value hedge
- Cash flow hedge
- Net investment hedge

slides.quizQuestion: Under IFRS 9, if the business model is hold to collect, assets are measured at?

slides.title: IFRS 15 - Revenue
slides.content:
# Revenue Recognition

## Five-Step Model

```
1. Identify contract
2. Identify performance obligations
3. Determine transaction price
4. Allocate to obligations
5. Recognize when satisfied
```

## Variable Consideration

| Method | When |
|--------|------|
| Expected value | Many outcomes |
| Most likely | Binary outcome |

## Constraint

Only include if highly probable no significant reversal.

## Contract Modifications

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Separate contract | New goods/prices |
| Prospective | Adjust remaining |
| Cumulative | Catch-up adjustment |

slides.title: IFRS 16 - Leases
slides.content:
# Lease Accounting

## Lessee Model

```
Right-of-use asset = Lease liability + direct costs

Lease liability = PV of lease payments
```

## Subsequent Measurement

| Component | Treatment |
|-----------|----------|
| ROU asset | Depreciate |
| Lease liability | Amortize |
| Interest | P&L expense |

## Lessor Accounting

| Type | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Finance lease | Derecognize asset |
| Operating lease | Keep asset, spread income |

## Classification Test

Finance lease if substantially all risks and rewards transfer.

slides.title: IAS 19 - Employee Benefits
slides.content:
# Employee Benefits

## Categories

| Type | Examples |
|------|----------|
| Short-term | Wages, salaries |
| Post-employment | Pensions |
| Other long-term | Long service |
| Termination | Redundancy |

## Defined Benefit Plans

```
Net liability = PV of obligation - Fair value of assets
```

## P&L vs OCI

| P&L | OCI |
|-----|-----|
| Service cost | Remeasurements |
| Net interest | Actuarial gains/losses |

## Actuarial Assumptions

- Discount rate
- Salary growth
- Mortality
- Inflation

slides.title: IFRS 3 - Business Combinations
slides.content:
# Acquisition Accounting

## Goodwill Calculation

```
Consideration transferred
+ NCI at acquisition
+ Previous equity interest
- Fair value of net assets
= Goodwill
```

## Consideration

| Type | Measurement |
|------|-------------|
| Cash | Amount paid |
| Shares | Fair value |
| Contingent | FV at acquisition |

## NCI Measurement

| Method | Basis |
|--------|-------|
| Full goodwill | Fair value of NCI |
| Partial goodwill | NCI% x net assets |

## Fair Value Adjustments

- PPE revaluation
- Intangibles identified
- Contingent liabilities

slides.title: Groups Quiz
slides.quizQuestion: Goodwill equals consideration plus NCI minus?

slides.title: Complex Groups
slides.content:
# Advanced Consolidation

## Mid-Year Acquisitions

- Time apportion profits
- Goodwill at acquisition date
- NCI share from acquisition

## Disposal of Subsidiary

```
Proceeds
+ FV of retained interest
- Net assets disposed
- NCI derecognized
- Goodwill derecognized
= Gain/loss on disposal
```

## Step Acquisitions

| Before | After |
|--------|-------|
| Associate | Subsidiary |
| Remeasure previous holding |
| Gain/loss in P&L |

## Partial Disposal

- Still control: Equity transaction
- Lose control: Full disposal

slides.title: Associates and JVs
slides.content:
# Equity Method

## Associates (IAS 28)

Significant influence (20-50%).

## Joint Ventures (IFRS 11)

Joint control, rights to net assets.

## Equity Method

```
Cost
+ Share of post-acquisition profits
- Dividends received
+/- Share of OCI
= Carrying amount
```

## Impairment

- Test investment for impairment
- Compare carrying amount to recoverable

## Intra-Group Transactions

| Direction | Adjustment |
|-----------|------------|
| Downstream | Full elimination |
| Upstream | Eliminate investor's share |

slides.title: Foreign Operations
slides.content:
# IAS 21 Foreign Currency

## Functional Currency

Currency of primary economic environment.

## Translation of Items

| Item | Rate |
|------|------|
| Monetary items | Closing rate |
| Non-monetary | Historic rate |

## Foreign Subsidiary Translation

| Item | Rate |
|------|------|
| Assets/liabilities | Closing |
| Income/expense | Average |
| Equity | Historic |

## Exchange Differences

- On monetary: P&L
- On translation: OCI
- Recycled on disposal

slides.title: Ethics in Reporting
slides.content:
# Ethical Reporting

## Accountant's Responsibility

| Duty | Meaning |
|------|--------|
| Integrity | Honest |
| Objectivity | Unbiased |
| Competence | Proper care |

## Ethical Issues

| Issue | Example |
|-------|--------|
| Pressure | Management targets |
| Judgment | Aggressive policies |
| Estimates | Bias |

## Professional Skepticism

- Question assumptions
- Challenge management
- Document reasoning

## Resolving Conflicts

- Gather facts
- Consider stakeholders
- Consult ethics committee
- Whistleblow if needed

slides.title: Other Standards
slides.content:
# Additional Standards

## IAS 12 - Income Taxes

| Type | Recognition |
|------|-------------|
| Current tax | Liability |
| Deferred tax | Temporary differences |

## IAS 37 - Provisions

| Criteria | All required |
|----------|-------------|
| Present obligation | Must exist |
| Probable outflow | Likely |
| Reliable estimate | Measurable |

## IFRS 13 - Fair Value

| Level | Input |
|-------|-------|
| 1 | Quoted prices |
| 2 | Observable |
| 3 | Unobservable |

## IFRS 5 - Non-current Assets Held for Sale

Lower of carrying amount and fair value less costs to sell.

slides.title: Analysis and Interpretation
slides.content:
# Financial Analysis

## Ratio Analysis

| Category | Ratios |
|----------|--------|
| Profitability | Margin, ROCE |
| Liquidity | Current, quick |
| Gearing | D/E, interest cover |
| Efficiency | Turnover ratios |

## Quality of Earnings

- Cash conversion
- One-time items
- Accounting policies
- Estimates

## Limitations

- Historic data
- Different policies
- Non-financial ignored
- Manipulation risk
